name: Valen_Korik
content:
Valen Korik was a male Human Mandalorian bounty hunter, he was legendary within the Sith Empire and the Mandalorians during the Cold War, but in violation of the Mandalorian-Imperial alliance, he killed two Sith Lords in Kaas City on Dromund Kaas and as a result, he and his men fled to the Dark Temple, where they become possessed by the spirits within the structure. He was killed by Imperial spacers who had enter the temple.
The target of the Heroic mission "Possessed Hunter" on Dromund Kaas, Valen Korik was cut along with the rest of the mission from the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. However, Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015 saw the mission restored to the game.
